description: This course provides a comprehensive research opportunity, including an introduction to relevant background material, technical instruction, identification of a meaningful project, and data collection. The topic is determined by the faculty member in charge of the course and may relate to their research interests. Offered annually. May be offered as a 1.00 credit course or .50 credit course. Prerequisite: determined by individual instructor.
name: Res: Linguistic Biases
notes: Closed at registration. Registration by permission.
title: Directed Undergraduate Research
